name: Neon Ronin
description:
The year is 2799--or so they would have called it. We know it only as the 110th year of the Third Dark Age.

Overview


Play as a band of neon-clad warriors as you battle triad thugs, cultsworn zealots, and tortured psychic mutants in tactical turn-based combat. Select stats and talents to deepen your strategy as your characters gain levels, unlocking powerful abilities along the way. Augment your party as you clear encounters by picking from unique rewards, each with devastating potential. Encounter ever-changing maps and enemies with each run and acquire new combinations of power-ups, making each run unique.

Learn your enemies, hone your strategy, and unlock each character's full power to defeat the corrupt forces working from the shadows of the fallen world.


  • Enjoy endless replayability

    Enjoy ever-changing maps and enemies, a vast array of power-ups, and the tension-building threat of permadeath. Discover devastating combinations of augments--each one synergizes differently with each character and each other augment, so choose wisely and build your characters into the ultimate instruments of (tactical) destruction over the course of a run.

  • Craft your perfect team

    Meet five unique characters each with distinct personalities and playstyles. Select a squad of three for each run--discover how their unique strengths and weaknesses complement each other. Unlock each character's full potential as they gain levels and learn new abilities and passives. Shape their strengths to complement your playstyle by allotting stat points and choosing between powerful talents.

  • Discover a stylish and richly imagined world

    Navigate through a neon-drenched megacity set in humanity's distant future. Discover the darkness and beauty of this grim world as you embark on a quest to save a nameless boy--saving the world itself is just an inconvenience along the way.
